item.title: Test Syntaxhighliter
item.description: PyBlosxom 関係ではないが、SyntaxHighlighter を入れてみて。 #! /usr/bin/env python import sys import re import poplib, email from email import Header host = 'localhost' port = 'PORT' account = 'MAIL-ADDRESS' password = 'PASSWORD' s = poplib.POP3 (host, port) s.apop (account, password) n = len
